name: Save the Tree (VKChiuselli)
description:
Lead the tree to the puddle water, don't touch the tree otherwise you lose!

SWAMP: it slow down the tree, but careful! If you touch the swamp or the puddle water, you lose

CRATES: They just stop the tree, use them to reset your position

CONTROLS 

 WASD: Move the fire

SPACE: Start level or go to main menu when you finish the game
